title: The broken heart A tragedy. Acted by the Kings Majesties Seruants at the priuate House in the Black-Friers.
author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Hugh Beeston, and are to be sold at his shop, neere the Castle in Corne-hill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
